metadata.name: MELISMA
metadata.description:
" MELISMA I : A GIFT SHARED"

A gift to share, a gift for all to hear. 
Using the bow to trigger the violin strings I set free the music within me, I set free my inner gift.

Why keep it hidden till it follows me 6ft under where no one listens? So, I set it free, give it freedom to soar above all criticism and bounding thoughts.

My craft, my path, my sound, my task. 

The journey I began, the race I have launched.

I hope to handover a worthy baton to the right ones so my craft outlives the completion of my task. - KAFANI ðŸŒ».
